entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
